title: How to Make a Simple Chocolate Cake

steps.title: Place all ingredients in a bowl.
steps.content: Place all ingredients in a bowl.

steps.title: Beat with an electric beater until the mixture is smooth.
steps.content: Beat with an electric beater until the mixture is smooth. Beat for around three minutes. This is a fairly wet mixture and the beating is important. Beat through enough to make a smooth batter but not too much that the air is taken out.

steps.title: Pour into grease and base lined (baking paper on the bottom) cake tin.
steps.content: Pour into grease and base lined (baking paper on the bottom) cake tin.

steps.title: Bake for approximately 40 minutes at 325째F (160째C) or until cooked when tested.
steps.content: Bake for approximately 40 minutes at 325째F (160째C) or until cooked when tested. Test by inserting a clean metal skewer into the center of the cake and when the skewer is pulled out, it should be clean. If there is a sign of batter on the skewer, the cake is not fully cooked. If the cake is still wet and/or moist when tested place it back in the oven for another 5-10 minutes.

steps.title: Add frosting, sprinkles, and any other sorts of decoration.
steps.content: Add frosting , sprinkles, and any other sorts of decoration.

steps.title: Place the mixing bowl out on the bench.
steps.content: Place the mixing bowl out on the bench.

steps.title: Pour the oil into the mixing bowl.
steps.content: Pour the oil into the mixing bowl.

steps.title: Add the caster/superfine sugar to the oil.
steps.content: Add the caster/superfine sugar to the oil.

steps.title: Mix to combine.
steps.content: Mix to combine. The sugar will soak up the oil and won't mix completely.

steps.title: Add the cocoa, flour, and baking powder to a separate mixing bowl.
steps.content: Add the cocoa, flour, and baking powder to a separate mixing bowl. Stir to combine.

steps.title: Crack the eggs into the oil mixture.
steps.content: Crack the eggs into the oil mixture. Add the flour mixture. Mix to combine.

steps.title: Grease or line the baking pan/tin.
steps.content: Grease or line the baking pan/tin. Pour the batter into the pan. Place in the preheated oven to bake.

steps.title: Bake for half an hour or until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean.
steps.content: Bake for half an hour or until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean.

steps.title: Remove from the oven using oven mitts.
steps.content: Remove from the oven using oven mitts. Allow to cool on a wire cooling rack before serving.
